TopicTitle: The outcome of the creepy Duna messgaes

Articles.Content:
Hello all you oldies that were in .17 and back. ( I know what ur thinking , .17? I Thought KSP started at .22!!! )

Anyway, if you remember, there was a big hullabaloo about things on duna. As far as I remember, we had the magic boulder to thank for a lot of this. Also, we had some strange beeping sounds, and when some techy poster mapped the sounds through some program, we got a quite interesting picture, showing 3 kerbal's, duna, ike, and kerbol. with some wird lines and stuff. There was also a lot of other cool easter egg stuff going around and I just wanted to know of anyone even remembers it, and if so, what did the forum find were the results of all this?

Thanks!

Yeah, there was a thread about it. It was IIRC a part of a grand plan NovaSilisko was brewing back then to connect all the easter eggs and make some sort of a story line concerning them. If you search a little you'll find the thread. SSTV signal duna would be good search keywords i guess.

Cheers!

Yeah, there was a thread about it. It was IIRC a part of a grand plan NovaSilisko was brewing back then to connect all the easter eggs and make some sort of a story line concerning them. If you search a little you'll find the thread. SSTV signal duna would be good search keywords i guess.

Cheers!

Yeah, I did some digging in my old forum post and found it here :

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/20962-0-17-Easter-eggs/page74

In case anyone wanted to take a look at it. Also, do you know if the dev's plan to do something like this again? i can tell you it was certainly quite interesting
iirc in Scott Manley's video the SSTV image was a spoiler for the next update where they introduced more planets and moons

Been thinking about this a lot since I saw Nassaults' new movie. IRC he's an "official" KSP team member. I wonder if he would be authorized to release something with hidden meaning, like 'The Rowsdower image'?

Seems like the devs are doing a clean up pass on the planetary surfaces (new biomes, new KSC grass, what appears to be new .25 Mun textures.), perhaps easter eggs are being linked/ redone/given some love.

http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/2iccxl/so_i_had_an_sstv_program_open_while_i_was/
Nova stated what it was when he left the team. It was going to be a pseudo-storyline for KSP.
